info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 12:04PM EST until March 03 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CST FOR MASSAC...CALLOWAY...WESTERN MARSHALL...BALLARD...MCCRACKEN AND GRAVES COUNTIES... At 1103 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located from near Kevil to just west of Mayfield to near Cuba, Kentucky, moving northeast at 65 mph. Multiple reports of wind gusts of 60 to 75 mph have been received with this line. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Paducah, Murray, Mayfield, Metropolis, Benton, La Center, Wickliffe, Reidland, Lone Oak, Brookport, Barlow, Barkley Regional Airport, Lynnville, Sedalia, Lovelaceville, West Paducah, Wingo, Hardin, Hazel and Kevil. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 24. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 31 and 38. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 9 and 49. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for southern Illinois...and western Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
